document_data.mainbody:
Iruladoon was a quasi-extraplanar forest that was located on the eastern bank of Lac Dinneshere in Icewind Dale. It was created by Mielikki specifically for her apparent Chosen, Drizzt DoUrden, in order to house and instruct his friends, the Companions of the Hall, prior to their reincarnations. 
Catti-brie and Regis were the first to arrive here after their deaths in 1385 DR. ) but the other three were reborn on Toril in the year 1463 DR. 
In 1466 DR, Drizzt DoUrden and his companions at the time (Dahlia Sinfelle, Artemis Entreri, Ambergris, Afafrenfere, and Effron) presumably spent a night here that turned out to last eighteen years in the outside world.
